title: Seven Fingers On One Hand
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, Dustin shares a clip from Love & Marriage Huntsville to discuss the larger conversation of homophobia in the black community.

Black Business of the Week - Tiffany Aliche’s “Get Good With Money” https://getgoodwithmoney.com

Wellness Segment - Fran’s #ReadToSleep Challenge http://bit.ly/franRTS

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Little Rock CVB - If you’re big on Black culture, you’re big on Little Rock. Home to dozens of Black-owned businesses and restaurants and six sites on the U.S. Civil Rights Trail, Little Rock is the perfect spot for your next vacation. Whether you’re big on food or fashion, history or heritage, you’re going to be big on Little Rock. Plan your visit today, at https://www.littlerock.com

 Cricket Wireless - Cricket Wireless can help you make the easy switch to the mobile plan that’s right for you, starting at $30 a month. Smile and switch to Cricket. Activation and other fees and restrictions apply. Terms subject to  change. See store for details. 

Door Dash - For a limited time, our listeners can get 25% off and zero delivery fees on their first order of $15 or more, when you download the DoorDash app and enter code FRIENDZONE. 

Netflix’s Okay Now Listen - Okay, Now Listen is a bi-weekly podcast hosted by Scottie Beam and Sylvia Obell, brought to you by Netflix and Strong Black Lead.  Join these best friends as they talk openly and honestly about what’s on their minds, what they're binging, and what’s blowing up their timelines. New episodes drop every other Thursday. 

Soul Cycle - https://www.MySoulCycleBike.com/FRIENDZONE, promo code FRIENDZONE to get a complementary pair of cycling shoes with the purchase of your SoulCycle at-home bike. 

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
